title: Reports
description: Reporting and monitoring platform for several beverage manufacturing plants. Built from scratch with React, Node.js and Tailwind CSS.

title: NexReel
description: Free movies and series catalog platform. Built from scratch with React, Node.js and Tailwind CSS.

title: ExciteBike Retro Project
description: Recreation of the classic NES motocross game with new features, such as coin collecting and lives, all in a digital environment!
